snippet: The former military ruler Pervez Musharraf left Pakistan on Friday for medical treatment after the government lifted a travel ban imposed on him as he awaited a trial on treason and other charges.
abstract: Pakistan's former military ruler Pervez Musharraf leaves country for medical treatment in Dubai.
lead_paragraph: The former military ruler Pervez Musharraf left Pakistan on Friday for medical treatment after the government lifted a travel ban imposed on him as he awaited a trial on treason and other charges.

headline.main: Pakistan: Musharraf Leaves for Treatment in Dubai
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Musharraf Leaves for Treatment in Dubai
